StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Massively parallel single-cell RNA-sequencing of chronic rhinosinusitis nasal and sinus tissue

Person.Organization: HARVARD MEDICAL SCHOOLMASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGYBOSTON CHILDREN'S HOSPITAL

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
INSTRUCTIONS: Approved Users agree to acknowledge the Contributing Investigator(s) who submitted data from the original study to dbGaP, the primary funding organization that supported the Contributing Investigators, and the NIH-designated data repository, in all oral and written presentations, disclosures, and publications resulting from any analyses of controlled-access data obtained through this DAR. Approved Users further agree that the acknowledgment shall include the dbGaP accession number to the specific version of the dataset(s) analyzed. A sample acknowledgment statement for the “Massively parallel single-cell RNA-sequencing of chronic rhinosinusitis nasal and sinus tissue” dataset(s) follows:
The datasets used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/gap/XXXXX through dbGaP study accession numbers xxxxx. Data from the “Massively parallel single-cell RNA-sequencing of chronic rhinosinusitis nasal and sinus tissue” project were provided by Joshua A. Boyce on behalf of collaborators at the Jeff and Penny Vinik Immunology, Division of Allergy and Clinical Immunology, Brigham and Women’s Hospital, Boston, MA, USA and the Institute for Medical Engineering and Science (IMES), Department of Chemistry, and Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard, Ragon institute of MGH, MIT and Harvard, and Koch Institute for Integrative Cancer Research, MIT, Cambridge, MA, USA.
Funding for the study of Pathophysiologic and therapeutic mechanisms in aspirin exacerbated respiratory disease was provided from the NIAID U19 AI AI095219. Additional Support: NIH grants NIH R01 HL120952, NIH R01 HL128241, T32 AI007306, U19AI070535, 1DP2OD020839, 2U19AI089992, 1U54CA217377, P01AI039671, 5U24AI118672, 2RM1HG006193, 1R33CA202820, K22 AI146281
Joshua A. Boyce and collaborators request that publications resulting from these data cite their original publication

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use

ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
